title: I'm talking about my life (Captioned)
creator_credit: Garry Bietel, Joann Geschiecht, Angelina Luke, Le Videographe and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Angelina is married to a violent man with a drinking problem. But her Malaysian culture makes it hard for her to leave but when she does she she succeeds. She then becomes determined to help other women in similar situations.
creator_credit_for_label: Garry Bietel, Joann Geschiecht, Angelina Luke, Le Videographe and ONF | NFB
